channel.title: [HELP] Port forwarding
channel.description:
Hey, Future here :)!
I've currently made a server, but it says that it's offline on the list. I THINK it's because i've got a router. If it is, i would like to know HOW to port-forward, and what to Port-forward. My router is NETGEAR DG834G (v2)
[b]- What i do when i switch my computer on -[/b]
1. open and run my source(FINE THERE) 2. Open Duc (Fine there?) 3. Open the client(FINE THERE) [b] But when i get to putting it on the list - it says its offline?[/b]
Which IP should i tell my friends about? My no-ip or MY ip??
ALso i dont know what happened to mopar :( I use a router.
[b](here are some pictures)[/b]
[URL=http://img261.imageshack.us/my.php?image=sufsfszq6.jpg][IMG]http://img261.imageshack.us/img261/5691/sufsfszq6.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Please help, Thanks
- Fo

u dont tell ANYONE ur IP u tell the ur no-ip like example.no-ip.org and http://portforward.com/routers.htm
